text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg I'm afraid the #COVID19 lockdown (a disastrous blunder) is TOO DEEPLY RESENTED - hence the ferocity of public reaction to Dominic Cummings' conduct. The only thing to do now is #EndLockdownNow. It'd not only save the country it might also save the Government's skin! @BorisJohnson
